website_summaries.verdict: A super affordable tablet keyboard that is ideal for Android tablet users who are looking for good quality.
pros: Includes hot keys customized for most Androids, but also works with iOS
Batteries can last up to six months
Slightly elevated design makes it easier to type
cons: This keyboard uses AAA batteries (not included), so there's no way to charge

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic key board. We thought it would be smaller but its ok its working so far. It seems to be easy to set things up. It would have been nice if the keys lit up. And we hated the delivery guy ALWAYS deliver to the Amazon locker late in thr day. Like 6pm. Even when there was no COVID-19 they still deliver really late in the day to amazon locker. (no accountability we guess) 👍I would recommend this Keyboard though.
customer_reviews.author: k t

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my Galaxy Samsung Tab S 10.5. I really liked that it paired easily, and that the keys have good feedback when I use them. Combined with my child's case, I can now have a "mini-laptop" at home! Note: I had initially reviewed this item as a 2-star since I had problems with the Bluetooth connection being lost every few seconds. It turned out it was a deffective unit, and after I got a replacement, it works perfectly. Be sure to test your keyboard for several minutes while you are still within the return period in case you have the same problem!
customer_reviews.author: Ryott

customer_reviews.title: Made my life easier
customer_reviews.text: I use this keyboard to hep me making nursing notes in my charts via my phone. I have a galaxy s9 and this keyboard connected right up. It's way easier charting with a keyboard than a phone key pad. The keyboard seems well made and is very thin and feels great to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to phones virtual keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a godsend for my phone. Love using it instead of the virtual soft keyboard on the phone. There has not been a hick up once with the keyboard, works flawlessly. Goes to sleep mode if not used and wakes up with a press of any button. No need to reconnect. Even has buttons that work for Android, like recent apps, previous song, next song, play/pause, volume, brightness etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. This is the keyboard in front of my Samsung Galaxy Tab S3 9.7''. It was fast to connect and works like a charm. Kinda wish you could plug it in to charge it instead of replacing AAA batteries but who cares. It works for what I need it for :)
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anne

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy. Followed the directions and had an easy setup. I like the rebound on the keys. I like the profile. Very, very nice!
customer_reviews.author: S. Claeys, Athens, GA

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to connect and seems to work nicely
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with my new Samsung Tab A tablet. It was easy to connect and seems to work nicely. It always takes a little time to get used to the feel of a new keyboard, but it is a nice size, and seems to be a comfortable angle. I think it will work well for taking notes during meetings. It requires two AAA batteries, and has an on/off switch. When I switched it off, my tablet moved seamlessly to the on-screen keyboard, and back to the keyboard again when turned on. I am pleased with the initial set-up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth E. Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard! Superb Product Support
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is great. Small enough to be portable, large enough to be usable. Very light weight. But doesn't seem flimsy. And I got wonderful product support from Tecurs Customer Support! I had a problem getting the 'shift' key to work properly. So Tecurs sent me a new keyboard. When the problem persisted, they helped me work through the tablet settings that was causing the problem. Even though it wasn't a problem with their hardware, they worked to make sure I was satisfied with the solution. Five stars doesn't seem like enough.
customer_reviews.author: Elric

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this keyboard!! It was an easy setup and it worked perfectly. It paired up with my phone as well. I highly recommend this product. I am going to order another one for my daughters tablet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works with TabS4
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect. This has made my life so much easier. I take my tablet to work now bc of COVID 19. There isn't much to do since we are closed to the public so I use this to type reports and email and seriously this keyboard is a gem. I have a Samsung TabS4 and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Lore

customer_reviews.title: There is reason why it’s cheap
customer_reviews.text: Came without usb dongle even though there is space for it under battery cover. Battery cover is flimsy and doesn’t hold in place ( falls out) - cheap plastic. Took few tries to connect to box, after which it’s been discovered that none of modifier keys actually working ( control/ alt / shift) . It is light though..
customer_reviews.author: S. Rodionov

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard for distance learning!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a keyboard for the school-issued iPad for distance learning. I thought this one has to be too good to be true for the price, but several other parents recommended it on the school facebook page, so I went for it. It works perfectly, is very comfortable to use, and even looks great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Visser

customer_reviews.title: Glitches and lags
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality of keyboard but it frequently glitches out in the middle of my typing, so it acts like I'm holding down on one letter and types it for an entire line. I have to turn it off and on again when this happens. It also times out (in under 10 mins) and I have to restart it then too. The glitching might be due to dying batteries but I've already changed them and shouldn't need to this often. Other times it is simply so to respond to the fact that I'm typing, or it lags. I'm using this with my Kindle Fire by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turns my phone into a laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Even my husband loves this keyboard! He always has some critique, but not this time. Our laptops are ancient with one cracked screen, so typing a lengthy email has been a challenge. With this keyboard, I just followed the simple pairing instructions, propped up my phone, and voila! Sturdy, ergonomic construction.
customer_reviews.author: CookieMomster

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Just stopped working wont work on some letters! I have gotten to keyboard from this company both different and both stoped working within a few weeks and only types a few letters no spills no damged caused on my end!
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: They keyboard is nice, connects easily, and so long as I don't get my tablet out of range, stays connected. Some people have mentioned that certain keys won't work - I have to use the original keyboard. The SHIFT keys don't work for capitalizing letters, and the function keys won't work if you're using a downloadable keyboard like Swype with Dragon. For the price, it's one of my favorite keyboards!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hilburn

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard .
customer_reviews.text: Really nice keyboard for a great price. Easy connect to all my devices. Works with my Samsung Galaxy Book that is running with Windows 10. Also works with my Samsung Galaxy S8+. Not usually a fan of devices that use batteries, but this is one less thing to recharge, and the batteries last a long time. Very happy with this keyboard and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Delfino

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. Now she uses it with her Fire ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 years ago for my daughter to use with her Galaxy S7. She loved it. Now she uses it with her Fire HD8. Both are much more convenient than hauling around a laptop. She is petit, so folks (guys) with larger hands may find it more difficult to use, but certainly not as difficult as using the smaller phone or tablet keys! Has held up well over the last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Clutterbugs

customer_reviews.title: These keyboards are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these keyboards and they are excellent for even a PC! If you start noticing the keyboard lagging or making errors, change the batteries and it will be good as new. The only concern I have is that there is no "Delete" key, so I remapped the right "Alt" key to act like a delete key and it did the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: John Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keyboard for my Samsung tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect keyboard. Just the right size and a simple easy to use layout. Looks like a small Apple keyboard. Be sure to push the little black button on the back when synching to your device. I wish that I would have seen and bought this keyboard long ago, I get very frustrated using the built-in keyboard on the tablet. Only minor negative is that the 2 AAA batteries needed are not included. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: donche andonov

customer_reviews.title: Love it and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this keyboard with my cell-phone on a small stand. It makes entering data, writing emails and posting on social media easier and faster. It more stable than the fold-up models of keyboard and is small enough to not take up much space which makes it easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in the Desert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size keyboard for me to take with me to use with my tablet. I needed something small enough to be portable, but large enough to still feel like a normal keyboard while typing . . . this fits the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: HomeschoolingInWI

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, auto shut off to preserve battery
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. Had a little user effort understanding how to connect between tablet and computer. Guess I should read the instructions that came with the package a bit closer. Great price and quality product. Device must turn off after a certain amount of time (probably documented) because I haven't proactively turned it off and the batteries are functioning as if they aren't constantly being drained.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Nakamoto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is the prefect size for travel, I can just take it out of my bag and set it on my lap or table. It has controls built into it for the tablet, like volume, brightness, and a home screen button. I love that it's a Bluetooth device and battery operated most of all, it has the ultimate freedom. So far it operates very satisfactorily and there was no trouble with setup. Also, the delivery was very quick with no damage to packaging or product.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Bad auto shutoff
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard has an auto shutoff feature, only problem is you have to hit 3 to 5 keys to get it working again. Unlike my logitech keyboard which you only have to hit 1 key and it still registers that key stroke as if it had never even shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Freelancer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do ordinary functions like cut, paste, select all, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it at first but doesn't do ordinary functions like cut, paste, select all, etc. Can't imagine making a keyboard without those functions. Kind of noisy too. Wanted to like it but had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet Keyboard and Great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this the day before I started my vacation. It arrived the next day at amazon locker , even a few hours early. Perfect. I opened the box, It was easy to connect to my Samsung Tablet using bluetooth connectivity. The tablet is good size, lightweight, responsive. It even has a bit of elevation in the back for ease of typing. I just connected this to my Samsung S6 phone. wonderful. Now my husband wants one for his phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Olives O.

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Nice looking, easy to set up.. goes with my samsung tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I dont use this for gaming, but I use it for music. It is a nice little keyboard, not to hard to set up. I can sit on the couch and put my songs into my tablet nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only 2 wks...
customer_reviews.text: keys began sticking and certain keys wouldn't work at all after about 2 weeks of use... disappointing. It was great when it worked, but I wish it didn't quit working on me while I needed it! I am a home health nurse and this thing quit on me during a patient visit.
customer_reviews.author: Elena F. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my galaxy Tab A
customer_reviews.text: After my laptop died I had to use my tablet for a while. This keyboard worked great. Wish I could say the same for the tablet, but that is another story.
customer_reviews.author: notinKSanymore

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous cost benefit. In my case I paired it with a Firestick streaming device, so I can type more easily whenever searching for shows or browsing the internet on my TV. The device goes to sleep automatically and reconnects at the first touch of a key, so you need not to worry about the battery discharging
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This little BT keyboard is sturdy, portable and does the trick to pair with my tablet for work related tasks. I think most people hate trying to type on their little on-screen keyboard especially if it is as tiny as the one on my 7" RCA. Works great! Excellent price. Arrived on time as promised. Happy. -M
customer_reviews.author: Marstonality

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the functionality of this device
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the functionality of this device. It was simple to connect to my tablet and works very well. Occasionally, a letter will appear several times in sequence when the button is not depressed, but it is rare. Otherwise, it looks and works wonderfully and I would happily recommend it to others for the price and quality. **I informed the company of this defect and their customer service was exceptional. They helped me resolve my problem quickly and respectfully. I would purchase from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Riverdancer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice. Worked just fine right out of the box. The keyboard has a better 'touch' than my computer keyboard. I was surprised at the speed. Usually Bluetooth has a delay which is irritating over time. I find that this keyboard has little, if any, delay between hitting the key and seeing the character on my Samsung Android Tablet or my LG Android cell phone. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Don Aspromonte

customer_reviews.title: Love the shortcuts, love the product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Arrived early, and in good condition. At first I was afraid it was the iPhone kind, not Android, but it works just fine. Takes two AAA batteries FYI to anyone who hasn't read specs. Love the keyboard shortcuts, if you have Samsung, hit the little magnifying glass emblem in place of what they call "META" whatever that means. Ex. Magnifying glass + L = calendar. Makes life so much easier! Applications, projects, etc. Everything has been splendid.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: great value for this Bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard for about a month and i have barely been using it, but i really like it. It works well with my Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 2014 Edition. Only downside is that i wish it was a little smaller, but i guess at least it is comfortable for typing. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for Bluetooth connecting keyboard because it's great product, light weight and looks like quality product. It was sold at lower price than comparable products
customer_reviews.author: Laurinka1111

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this keyboard for replacing an old one, which stopped working in about a year, from a different vendor. Both the Bluetooth connection and the power saving work great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chiang

customer_reviews.title: Nice little keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little keyboard totally comfortable to use and very easy connection. We tried connecting to phone note 8 and to Samsung tablet works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth connectivity, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular keyboard because my Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 is too advanced for its Samsung counterpart. I liked how I can connect quickly and it works well off the gate. It took me a minute to get the directions on use straight, but once I did it earned the 5 stars that I gave it above. Thanks a lot for the cheap, and worthwhile product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony's

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard looks expensive and it really is not i use it for my galaxy View and so far it works great! All keys work properly connection was very easy. Id anything changes i will definitely update my review!
customer_reviews.author: Zay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard does great for my needs. It takes a bit to get used to, as it's small. It works great with my Samsung Galaxy Tab S5e.
customer_reviews.author: KA Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: It stopped workin6g for me after two mon6ths, ran6dom b5utton6s get pressed I have left above unedited text from typing with the keyboard
customer_reviews.author: AMZN-FANATIC

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT product and VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect and works extremely well with my Samsung phone and Samsung tablet. I liked it so much I ordered a second one for my Mother who has a Samsung phone and a Amazon Fire Tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Patton

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it didn't. Only lasted a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: worked ok for a couple weeks then keys started getting stuck and Bluetooth stopped connecting. Altogether it was a good little keyboard until it wasn't
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: It just repeats keys if it registers them at all. It has a long delay also. It's a piece of junk and a mistake to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Roman

customer_reviews.title: it is very easy to get connect
customer_reviews.text: it is very easy to get connect. it is automatically connected after laptop restarted. other bluetooth devices are only automatically connected after login. So I love this product as it is available immediately after you start the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: SIWEI PU

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered this to use with his tablet and he loves it. Has never had issues connecting or anything. Looks great in person too.
customer_reviews.author: JoneZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like that I was expecting in this upgrade was that the Enter key send messages and I have to go back to the phone to send them. Other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard to use with my Samsung Tab S2 while I am traveling so that I can keep up with work and it works great! I had no problems connecting with my tablet and for the price, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: RedRyder74

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have only just received my keyboard but it arrived quickly and was packaged well. I have used it a few times and love it. It makes life so much easier. It was so easy to connect it to my Samsung s7 and my Samsung tablet. It looks smart too. My only regret is that I did not purchase this sooner. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up - amazing price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Bluetooth keyboard. You can't beat the price. I've used it three times and had no issues with it. My father-in-law received a different brand Bluetooth keyboard for Christmas (probably from a local electronics store) and it took us about 20 minutes to get it to work. I set this one up in 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Biotekguy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to connect to our devices. Lightweight and didn't slide when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Very well packed and the keyboard feels solid.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my S10+. I use it for the Linux on DeX application. Works fine. I personally like the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Calico

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and lasted 3-4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap blue tooth keyboard. Used it at office so that I could respond to emails and texts on my mobile phone. Used it three to four times each meet for just a few minutes at a time. Poorly made and lasted 3-4 months before failing. Not sure why it stopped working; one day it just stopped pairing to the phone. Tried everything. No luck. Cannot complain too much bc the price was right. Will probably replace it with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: AStaebell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty okay. Typing is fairly smooth. It looks amazing with my white tablet (Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8). Sometimes it's not as smooth to connect so I restart my tablet and turn off the keyboard when it happens. Forces it to reconnect. Overall, it does what I need it to. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect wirelessly, works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Brothers to use with my tablet, connected ridiculously easy. Very comfortable to use to type one. Would reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: The product came in time, box good condition same as the item. It works good, i thought only allow to connect android but it connect to my ios too. Good job, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jeralyn Pintore

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to be productive!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Very light and sleek looking and works well. Would be nice with a mousepad. But that's not what I was looking for in this product. Very reasonably priced and quick shipping. I bought this out of desparation to do some work on my tablet while waiting for my child's practice to be over in 2+ hours most nights of the week Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: Simple keyboard to fit all your needs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 8.0, and this keyboard is a godsend. Paired up the first time I turned it on, and always syncs. It's a little bigger than the tablet, which is a plus for me. I have big fingers and the keyboard fits my hands perfectly. Function keys are self explanatory and it's quiet when you type--no noisy keystrokes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelex

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little keyboard. The keys have an excellent feel and they are at least as large as the ones on my laptop. I'm pleasantly surprised at the quality look and feel of the keyboard. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard but NO INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: While this keyboard is working great the one thing I feel was lacking was the fact that there we NO INSTURCTIONS with the item. This was very frustrating and I had to get help to match it to my Samsung Galaxy Tab. I strongly suggest that instructions be included with the unit to make it more friendly usable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard is very easy to sync with devices as I have synced it ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this bluetooth keyboard for my Samsung Galaxy Note Tablet. The keyboard is very easy to sync with devices as I have synced it with my Samsung phone also. It's sleek in look, lightweight, and small enough to fit in a brief case, travel bag or backpack. The keyboard itself has a hard base that's very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Reece Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, perfect, perfect! Connects fast, woeks great and long battery life. Works on my Samsung phone and tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great for tablets!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard came at the expected shipping date and works great! It connects to my tablet and my phone via Bluetooth and is useful when you need to type a lot and get tired of the touch screen keyboard. It does require AAA batteries (which are not included) so be sure to have some on handy! The keyboard itself is slightly elevated so it is easier on the wrists. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to connect to many different devices and easy to type on
customer_reviews.author: Corey W.

customer_reviews.title: What i have been lookong for
customer_reviews.text: I can not wait to use this, I thought it was rechargeable, so I have to go out and get batteries so that I can use it. However, the look and feel is EXACTLY what I have been looking for in a wireless keyboard. Super excited it's here and I can't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Telling it like it is

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work with tab 4
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my samsung galaxy tab 4 8.0 and even though it says its compatible, it doesnt work. It connects just fine, but doesnt actually work when using the keyboard. I tried it with my mom's ipad mini and it works just fine. So there's nothing wrong with the device, just doesn't work with my tab 4. Also, I purchased the android version and not the apple version fyi.
customer_reviews.author: JDCM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth keyboard at a super low price!  Win-Win!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard! Purchased it to use with my Samsung Galaxy Tab Pro tablet. It synched to my tablet quickly. It's light, has it's own built in stand and it's relatively comfortable to type on. I ordered a second one for my sis-in-law for her iPad mini and it works well with that also! Great buy at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Shantae Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Good little keyboard for using with a tablet for minimum use
customer_reviews.author: papabearinslc

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, slim, great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this keyboard. It fits very nicely into my carry on laptop back pack. Lightweight. I wish it was rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim & Margo  Wendt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely surprised at the quality and ease of use for the price!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Shift key does not work to capitlize!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the thought of this keyboard. Perfect size for what I was needing it for. BUT... Does anyone know why the sift keys do not work? I've ordered two to see if I had just gotten a faulty one, but they don't work on either model. Help please!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I like it BUTTTTTTT
customer_reviews.text: I like this keyboard a lot and for the price its even better. What i dont like is thats i only takes batteries and i thought i could charge it or have the option to connect it to an outlet
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard was very easy to install. I've only used it briefly, but it worked well. I would recommend it for light use for sure. I like the raised keys. Makes for more accurate typing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a tablet
customer_reviews.text: Worked eerily well. Perfect addition to a tablet. Used it while traveling abroad for work.
customer_reviews.author: MakeYerMark

customer_reviews.title: Practical, Easy to Use, and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this product. It's very easy to connect to my devices and the function keys (brightness, home, and others)work great. The keys feel very much like the keys on a laptop. I bought this for travel in order to use it for my phone, and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Works as described right out of the box. Shipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described right out of the box. Shipped fast. This helps me so much since I find myself pulled over or in a coffee shop to type long emails in my phone. Having this is a game changer, making it much easier and faster. Once synced with your phone, it links right up soon as you turn it on each time after that.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: will not turn on
customer_reviews.text: I can't even get this keyboard to stay on, once batteries which are not included are put in correctly it turns on for maybe 5 seconds and then turns off, I am returning this to the seller. Very disappointed, I have never ordered anything on here and it just not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Samsung Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This was a good, economical choice for my old Samsung Tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Omoton Keyboard- Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love it. In fact I purchased another one for my Apple Ipad( the brand new Ipad that just came out). Both my Samsung and Apple paired quickly. Not only easy to pair but also fast! The price is phenominal and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LouW

customer_reviews.title: Would buy product again, without hesitation
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this thing! I have typed on it for countless hours... 70+. Still no battery change. No sticking keys, really light to carry, size replicates a normal keyboard for ease of use and no carpal tunnel issues!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: ... keyboard because pecking on a tablet got to be super cumbersome. I can type in my lap and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this keyboard because pecking on a tablet got to be super cumbersome. I can type in my lap and put the tablet on a desk, chair, or across the room if I want. I only wish that it worked with my spell check. Other than that, no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shar7HB

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised at how easy this was to connect to my tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how easy this was to connect to my tablet. I was worried I would struggle with the small keyboard, but had no problem adjusting. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard to use with my Samsung Tab 2. As it's an older tablet I wasn't sure it would work. Have had it and used it for about a month now. Couldn't be happier. My laptop crashed and I've had to use my tablet for work ( I work at home). This keyboard has been a lifesaver. It's really easy to type on and it's slightly wider than my 10.1 tab2. I'm extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katie57

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Did the job, connected well to my Samsung galaxy tablet. Nice keyboard for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it! It was really easy to connect it to my tablet and I can carry it on my bag and connect it to all my devices. Perfect for anyone who looks something not heavy to carry around to work, university, etc. And it came so freaking early, definetly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joeliz Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It's buttons so lovely and pairings a breeze. Its sleek slim appearance is aiming to please.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Oz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchased!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect to work with my iPad and it looks so clean and elegant much like the apple products. It's super easy to connect and I highly recommend it. The only reason I have given a 4 star instead of 5 is because the F commands are in like a dark blue which, I am not too crazy about but that's just my preference also the keys are a bit louder than the ones on my Mac.
customer_reviews.author: DCmom

customer_reviews.title: Laggy.
customer_reviews.text: A bit laggy but works good. Just wish it kept up with my typing.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bauer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wireless keyboard I've tried, and I really like it. It is lightweight, but has a good sturdy feel to it. Large enough to feel natural to type on. Easy connection with my Kindle and Samsung tablets.
customer_reviews.author: GLS

customer_reviews.title: Very good bluetooth keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this today. Very easy to pair with my Samsung Galaxy Note 8. Takes AAA batteries which is awesome. Keys are a little noisy when you start typing fast, but they are easy to press. First time using a bluetooth keyboard, always used the onscreen one. This keyboard will make it so much easier to do my school work when I am away from home. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Jones

customer_reviews.title: I wish the directions were better. It paired easily
customer_reviews.text: I wish the directions were better. It paired easily, but the top row with the functions keys do not all work and I cannot use keyboard shortcuts. I can't even do a control find, if the directions were better maybe I'd be able to figure it out, but the directions will show you initial set-up and then they want you to go back to their amazon store to buy more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Red Sunnys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Keyboard! Sturdy Build and easily connects!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is perfect and works wonderfully. It connects to all by Bluetooth devices without any problem at all. It is nice looking and also built very well, and sturdy. Nice size, as I can take it anywhere with me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works great when you need a keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Connected to both Samsung S6 phone and Samsung Galaxy Tablet, without any issues! Works great. Keyboard feels right. ( I thought it might be too small, but it is perfect.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and I love the android features on the top. It's very responsive almost no lag and pairs very fast. It's a great keyboard Samsung devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Osteen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard! It connects right to my Samsung note pro without any problems. In fact, I'm using it to type this review and as you can see there are words on your screen:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an upcoming trip. Will need to work on a couple of documents and long emails and didn't want to bring my laptop. Got it connected and working very easily. Feels solid even though it is small, very slim and light.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. It was easy to connect. On screen speed was perfect. No lag. Has a quality feel under my fingers. Would buy again for other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: this keyboard is way too cute, no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi mucchiz

customer_reviews.title: Blu-tooth Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to have, should you need it. Blutooth connect to any blutooth capable device. I use it with my phone, my Samsung Tab 4. It is of great quality. You power it with a couple of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: tada

product_meta.title: OMOTON Tab A 10.1/8.0 2019 Keyboard, Ultra-Slim Bluetooth Keyboard for Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1/8.0/9.7/7.0, Tab S6 / S5e / S4, Galaxy Note Series and Other Bluetooth Enabled Devices, White
feature_bullets: BROAD COMPATIBILITY: Keyboard Designed for Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 / 8.0 2019, also compatible with Galaxy Tab S6/ S5e/ S4/ S3/ S2, Galaxy Tab A 10.5/ 10.1/ 9.7/ 8.0/ 7.0, Tab E 9.6/ 8.0 , Tab E lite 7.0, other Bluetooth enabled tablets, laptops, and mobile phones
REASONABLE LAYOUT: QWERTY layout with hot keys are customized for Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 / 8.0 2019 and other Android devices, enhancing the using experience
STABLE SCISSOR MECHANISM: Low profile keys provide a quieter and smoother typing experience, and Galaxy Tab A 10.1 / 8.0 2019 keyboard can be struck for more than 3 million times
COMPACT and PORTABLE: The ultra-slim Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 / 8.0 2019 keyboard can be easily packed in backpacks and handbags. Enjoy with it wherever you go
LONG BATTERY LIFE: 30-days continuous use and automatic power-saving mode allows up to half a year between battery changes (2 X AAA Battery, Not Included)
